articles.content: Kotak Mutual Fund, Indias fifth largest mutual fund house, launches a new scheme on August 31. Called Kotak Multi Asset Allocation Fund (KMAAF), it will invest across different asset classes. In effe… [+5442 chars]

articles.title: RVNL shares up 2% on Rs 256.2 crore projects bid - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The share price surged over 300 percent in the last one-year.
articles.content:
Rail Vikas Nigam (RVNL) share price rose 2 percent in the early trade on August 31 after the company emerged as the lowest bidder (L1) for projects of Maharashtra Metro Rail Corporation.
